summary: The Cython.Build package supplies a comprehensive build infrastructure for Cython projects, offering command‑line utilities and programmatic APIs to translate Python/Cython sources into C code, compile and link them into native extensions, manage build caches, track module dependencies, support inline compilation, and integrate with IPython notebooks via magic commands.
business_intent: Accelerate development of high‑performance Python extensions by automating Cython compilation, reducing rebuild times through caching, simplifying dependency handling, and enabling interactive experimentation, thereby helping teams deliver faster, more efficient software.
